data.enText: connected with a large or capital city
connected with a particular country rather than with the other regions of the world that the country controls

simple_means.memory_skill: metro n.地铁 + polit 城市 + -an ...的

tr: a person who lives in a metropolis
in the Eastern Orthodox Church this title is given to a position between bishop and patriarch
equivalent to archbishop in western Christianity
relating to or characteristic of a metropolis

example.tran: 大城市的圆滑世故和乡村的天真纯朴

value.def: Metropolitan means belonging to or typical of a large busy city.

example.ex: ...the Ukrainian Catholic representatives, Metropolitan Volodymyr and Bishop Sofron.
example.tran: 乌克兰的天主教代表——弗拉基米尔大主教和索夫龙主教

value.def: A metropolitan is an important priest in the Orthodox and Catholic Churches. He has authority over other priests and is in charge of a particular area.
